subNode:value.scalar:string: product_comment_criterion_lang ( `id_product_comment_criterion` INT( 11 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL , `id_lang` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL , `name` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY ( `id_product_comment_criterion` , `id_lang` ) ) ENGINE=

product_comment_criterion_category ( `id_product_comment_criterion` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `id_category` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id_product_comment_criterion`, `id_category`), KEY `id_category` (`id_category`) ) ENGINE=
product_comment ADD `deleted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL AFTER `validate`
product_comment_criterion ADD `id_product_comment_criterion_type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL AFTER `id_product_comment_criterion`
product_comment_criterion ADD `active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL AFTER `id_product_comment_criterion_type`
